full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Category 3 - Office Furniture and Metal Storage Cabinets

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01014253 (Revision 2)

**Solicitation Number:** 5Z011-23-0217

**Publication Date:** November 22, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** December 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST)

**Description:**

Library and Archives Canada is soliciting responses to a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of office furniture, including metal filing and storage cabinets. The requirement falls under Category 3 of the Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C.

**Key Details:**

* The requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) as well as other Canada-specific free trade agreements.
* The office furniture and metal storage cabinets are to be delivered to 550 de la Cité, Gatineau, QC, J8T 0A7.
* The delivery deadline is January 27, 2023.
* Suppliers must be holders of the SA # E60PQ-140003/C.

**Access to Documentation:**

A link to the solicitation package, including the Questions and Answers and the Work Statement, can be found on the Buy and Sell website at:
- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/30/d3cd8c1336951522a6312f845190fa6b/23-0217_questions_and_answers_-_questions_et_reponses.pdf
- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/23/ae421083ee0b0959e9a72765a914514b/23-0217_ws_annex_e_standard_rfb_en.pdf

**Contact Information:**
To submit a bid or obtain additional information, please contact:
- Name: Legault, Isabelle
- Email: [isabelle.legault@bac-lac.gc.ca](mailto:isabelle.legault@bac-lac.gc.ca)
- Phone: 613-410-4428

Please note that the tender closing date is December 6, 2023, and any submissions received after this date will not be considered. Suppliers are responsible for ensuring their bids are in compliance with all requirements outlined in the solicitation package.  highest bidder who complies with all requirements will be awarded the
